name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色ふぇすてぃばる。【#湊あくあ4周年記念】 [O4Ip7gZQOts]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua performs her original song 'Akutan no Koto Suki-sugi Song' during her 4th Anniversary 3D Live.
Instrumental transition between songs with visuals of the stage and character assets.
Minato Aqua performs 'I Wanna' (あいわな).
Minato Aqua addresses the audience briefly at the end of the segment.

subtitles.original: ずっとそばで笑っていたいな　遊びたいな
subtitles.english: I want to keep smiling by your side, I want to play

subtitles.original: ずっと仲良くしてね
subtitles.english: Stay on good terms with me forever, okay?

subtitles.original: （Yeah!）
subtitles.english: (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: 星降る夜に　魔法をかけちゃいましょう
subtitles.english: On this starry night, let's cast a spell

subtitles.original: いたずらだってご愛嬌でしょ
subtitles.english: Even mischief is just part of my charm, right?

subtitles.original: （Fu-fu!）
subtitles.english: (Fu-fu!)

subtitles.original: 上目遣い
subtitles.english: An upward glance

subtitles.original: （Hey!）
subtitles.english: (Hey!)

subtitles.original: イチコロでしょ
subtitles.english: You'll fall for me in an instant

subtitles.original: （Wow!）
subtitles.english: (Wow!)

subtitles.original: おかえり、ご主人！
subtitles.english: Welcome home, Master!

subtitles.original: お砂糖お醤油間違えちゃった
subtitles.english: I mixed up the sugar and soy sauce

subtitles.original: ご飯？お風呂？それともあ・く・あ？
subtitles.english: Dinner? A bath? Or... A-ku-a?

subtitles.original: メイドからメイド　メイドなんです！
subtitles.english: From maid to maid, I'm a maid!

subtitles.original: お茶は苦手　水ならOK！
subtitles.english: I'm not good with tea, water is OK!

subtitles.original: こたつでカニ鍋やっぱ鍋！
subtitles.english: Crab hot pot in the kotatsu, gotta have hot pot!

subtitles.original: 壊れたテレビは叩けば直る！
subtitles.english: A broken TV can be fixed by hitting it!

subtitles.original: 低気圧やば！一生寝てよ
subtitles.english: Low pressure is awful! Let's sleep forever

subtitles.original: お隣さん　お向かいさん
subtitles.english: Neighbors, people across the street

subtitles.original: 世界のみなさん　お前さん
subtitles.english: Everyone in the world, and you

subtitles.original: 銀河一のラブを込めて　いくよ
subtitles.english: Sending you the best love in the galaxy, here I go

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: おいしくな～れ！萌え萌えキュン！
subtitles.english: Become delicious! Moe moe kyun!

subtitles.original: 泣いて　凹んで　笑って
subtitles.english: Crying, feeling down, laughing

subtitles.original: 夢を追いかけています
subtitles.english: I'm chasing my dreams

subtitles.original: おとぎ話だと言わせないよ
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone say it's just a fairy tale

subtitles.original: ずっと私を見ててね
subtitles.english: Keep watching me forever

subtitles.original: 恋をしちゃったら消えちゃうマーメイド
subtitles.english: A mermaid who disappears if she falls in love

subtitles.original: 重たくなったらごめんね
subtitles.english: Sorry if things get too heavy

subtitles.original: でも！
subtitles.english: But!

subtitles.original: （Oh-wow!）　トモダチじゃないもん
subtitles.english: (Oh-wow!) We're not just friends!

subtitles.original: メイド服脱げたら　ただの女の子だけど
subtitles.english: When I take off my maid uniform, I'm just an ordinary girl

subtitles.original: あなたとの思い出作れますか？
subtitles.english: Can I make memories with you?

subtitles.original: ずっと仲良くしてね
subtitles.english: Stay on good terms with me forever

subtitles.original: （Yeah!）
subtitles.english: (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: 他の誰かを見ないで
subtitles.english: Don't look at anyone else

subtitles.original: しわくちゃになっちゃったって
subtitles.english: Even if we get all wrinkled

subtitles.original: 思い出してね　この
subtitles.english: Please remember this

subtitles.original: （Oh-wow!）　オムライス
subtitles.english: (Oh-wow!) Omelet rice

subtitles.original: 全部食べて！
subtitles.english: Eat it all!

subtitles.original: なんちゃって
subtitles.english: Just kidding!

subtitles.original: （Wahhh!）
subtitles.english: (Wahhh!)

subtitles.original: 月曜日は身体が動きません
subtitles.english: My body won't move on Mondays

subtitles.original: っていうか毎日でした　ピリピリ偏頭痛
subtitles.english: Actually, it's every day, a tingling migraine

subtitles.original: 私ったらメイドの個性的料理ダメ
subtitles.english: I'm a maid but bad at unique cooking

subtitles.original: 掃除もちょっとアレ　てんてこまいでまいった
subtitles.english: Cleaning is also a bit... I'm overwhelmed and troubled

subtitles.original: お醤油あるのみですね
subtitles.english: I only have soy sauce

subtitles.original: Hey you 会いたくなってしまったな
subtitles.english: Hey you, I've started wanting to see you

subtitles.original: 今夜も
subtitles.english: Tonight as well

subtitles.original: ヨナヨナ集まって何する？
subtitles.english: Gathering night after night, what shall we do?

subtitles.original: 月火水木金土日365日24時間画面越しご挨拶
subtitles.english: Mon-Tue-Wed-Thu-Fri-Sat-Sun, 365 days, 24 hours, greeting through the screen

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 好きになっちゃって言っちゃって全然可愛くない
subtitles.english: I fell in love and said it, not cute at all

subtitles.original: （ない！）
subtitles.english: (Not!)

subtitles.original: 勝手に凹んだって泣いてみたって全然可愛くない
subtitles.english: Feeling down on my own, trying to cry, not cute at all

subtitles.original: 君だって同じ　ダメよりの事由です
subtitles.english: You're the same, a reason for being no good

subtitles.original: そんな優しくして　私に気があるのかな？
subtitles.english: Being so kind, I wonder if you have feelings for me?

subtitles.original: もうこんな時間どんな予感神ハプニング
subtitles.english: It's already this time, what a feeling, a divine happening

subtitles.original: 亜中毒症状急上昇MAXメンタル崩壊
subtitles.english: Aqua addiction symptoms skyrocketing MAX mental breakdown

subtitles.original: あなたのことをもっともっと知りたい
subtitles.english: I want to know more and more about you

subtitles.original: 水曜日は意識がレボリューション
subtitles.english: Wednesdays, my consciousness undergoes a revolution

subtitles.original: っていうか毎日でした　ピリピリ偏頭痛
subtitles.english: Actually, it's every day, a tingling migraine

subtitles.original: 私ったら競争社会不適合者
subtitles.english: I'm a misfit for this competitive society

subtitles.original: でも挙動は適合者のふりして暴言吐いて
subtitles.english: But I pretend to be a fit behavior-wise while spitting out insults

subtitles.original: 凹んだこれって法廷事後？
subtitles.english: Fell down, is this a post-court matter?

subtitles.original: Hey you 会いたくなってしまったな
subtitles.english: Hey you, I've started wanting to see you

subtitles.original: 今夜も
subtitles.english: Tonight as well

subtitles.original: 自家警備からの脱却
subtitles.english: Escape from home security

subtitles.original: 頑張れ私　負けるな
subtitles.english: Hang in there, me! Don't give up!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 好きになっちゃって言っちゃって全然可愛くない
subtitles.english: I fell in love and said it, not cute at all

subtitles.original: （ない！）
subtitles.english: (Not!)

subtitles.original: 勝手に凹んだって泣いてみたって全然可愛くない
subtitles.english: Feeling down on my own, trying to cry, not cute at all

subtitles.original: 君だって同じ　ダメよりの事由です
subtitles.english: You're the same, a reason for being no good

subtitles.original: そんな優しくして　私に気があるのかな？
subtitles.english: Being so kind, I wonder if you have feelings for me?

subtitles.original: もうこんな時間どんな予感神ハプニング
subtitles.english: It's already this time, what a feeling, a divine happening

subtitles.original: 亜中毒症状急上昇MAXメンタル崩壊
subtitles.english: Aqua addiction symptoms skyrocketing MAX mental breakdown

subtitles.original: あなたのことをもっともっと知りたい
subtitles.english: I want to know more and more about you

subtitles.original: あー　特別じゃない
subtitles.english: Ah, it's not special

subtitles.original: 私のこと　勘違いして
subtitles.english: Misunderstand me

subtitles.original: 馬鹿ね
subtitles.english: You fool

subtitles.original: 馴れ合いこそが
subtitles.english: Familiarity itself is

subtitles.original: 君と僕を繋ぐ光
subtitles.english: The light that connects you and me

subtitles.original: 今日は4周年ライブに遊びに来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to my 4th anniversary live today!
